GNAT Documentation

0.25

GNAT

GNAT (Graphical AI Tracer, the 'N' stands for Nothing!) is a tool which allows students and teachers alike to create graphs of puzzles and trees and obtain traces for them quickly and easily. Use the above links to view the documentation on the code, as well as the code itself.

Click Here to download the Windows installer for GNAT.
